DOC.brief_summary: The aim current study demonstrate commercial weight management diet ( i.e . low energy density ) influence satiation , hunger satiety lead low energy intake ad-libitum meal full day . We seek demonstrate sustainability effect follow 12- week weight loss weight management program . - We hypothesise formulate ( low energy ) meal lead decrease hunger , great fullness reduce desire eat compare standard meal . - We hypothesise commercial weight management program lead great weight loss compare control program . - We hypothesise formulate meal ( high consumer acceptance ) improve hedonic control eating ( low want high fat food ) - We hypothesise commercial weight management program improve hedonic control eating ( reduced experience food craving )
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Multi-component Weight Management Program Appetite , Food Preference Body Weight
DOC.criteria: BMI 28 45 kg/m2 Reporting interest weight loss , actively participate commercial weight loss program , Not increased physical activity level past 24 week Able eat everyday food fruit vegetable Written inform consent give Significant health problem could cause confound effect intervention control . Taking medication supplement know affect appetite weight within past month and/or study Pregnant , plan become pregnant breastfeed History anaphylaxis food Known food allergy food intolerance Smokers recently cease smoking Participants receive systemic local treatment likely interfere evaluation study parameter Those previously take part commercial weight loss program last 6 month ? . Participants work appetite feed relate area Participants unable consume food use study Participants bariatric surgery Participants history eat disorder Presence untreated hypothyroidism Inability fully comply intervention study procedure Insufficient English language skill complete study questionnaire
